import java.io.*;

public class Operators {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int a = 12, b = 6;

		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		System.out.println("Arithmetic operators");
		// Addition operator
		System.out.println("a + b = " + (a + b));

		// Subtraction operator
		System.out.println("a - b = " + (a - b));

		// Multiplication operator
		System.out.println("a * b = " + (a * b));

		// Division operator
		System.out.println("a / b = " + (a / b));

		// Modulus operator
		System.out.println("a % b = " + (a % b));

	}

}
